definition: suffix of a noun of locality
Laobian district of Yingkou City 營口市|营口市, Liaoning

sentences.english: The disruption of the Shensi-Kansu-Ningsia Border Region was part of their plot.
sentences.chinese: 陕甘宁边区，是这种阴谋的一部分。

sentences.english: Hebei-Shandong-Henan border revolutionary memorial hall is located in Heze city near the Zhao Wang river.
sentences.chinese: 冀鲁豫边区革命纪念馆位于菏泽市城区赵王河畔。

sentences.english: And the fourth part analyses the reasons that the education in the border area can make great achievements.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分剖析了边区教育取得伟大成就的原因。

sentences.english: Before the Anti-Japanese War , there almost had no modern industry in the region.
sentences.chinese: 抗战前陕甘宁边区几乎没有近代工业。

sentences.english: On the plains of the Border Region, it was even more difficult to maintain the war against the Japs than in the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 在边区的平原地带坚持抗战，比在山区还要困难。

sentences.english: WuLin region is intersection broader area of Xiang, E, Yu and Qian province.
sentences.chinese: 武陵地区是指的以武陵山脉为中心的湘鄂渝黔边区。

sentences.english: The Burmese government blocks everything from being sent into our territory, even salt.
sentences.chinese: 缅甸政府封锁了我们边区进口的所有东西。

sentences.english: The szechuan-shensi border area has had a good harvest .
sentences.chinese: 川陕边区的农业收成良好。

sentences.english: The Kuomintang forces continued their attacks into the border areas.
sentences.chinese: 国民党军继续向边区腹地进犯。

sentences.english: The reaches of the Dingjiang River in the border region of Fujian anf Guangdong are the habitats of the Kejia nationality.
sentences.chinese: 位于闽粤边区的汀江流域是客家族群聚居之地。

sentences.english: The Border Region started a series of partial counter-offensives against Japanese positions.
sentences.chinese: 边区军民开始向日军据点发起了一系列局部反攻。

sentences.english: The authorities sent him to the military academy for study as a cadet.
sentences.chinese: 边区当局将他送进军政大学学习。

sentences.english: There is a common culture backing of the advanced education in the Hunan Hubei Chongping Sichan Guizhou Border region.
sentences.chinese: 湘鄂渝川黔边区高职高专教育有着共同的文化背景。

sentences.english: In March this year the Red Army in the Szechuan- Shensi border area began its shift.
sentences.chinese: 今年三月，川陕边区的红军也开始转移。

definition: Shanxi 山西, Chahar 察哈爾|察哈尔 and Hebei 河北 (three provinces of the Republic of China in the period 1912-1936)
old name for district of Hohhot city 呼和浩特[Hu1 he2 hao4 te4], Inner Mongolia
Eighth Route Army, the larger of the two major Chinese communist forces fighting the Japanese in the Second Sino-Japanese War (1937-1945)
Liberation city district/Jiefang district of Jiaozuo city 焦作市[Jiao1 zuo4 shi4], Henan
New Fourth army of Republic of China, set up in 1937 and controlled by the communists
former Suiyuan province in Inner Mongolia and Shanxi
red bandit (i.e. PLA soldier (during the civil war) or Chinese communist (Tw))
former Ninggang county in Jiangxi, now within Jinggangshan county level city 井岡山市|井冈山市[Jing3 gang1 shan1 shi4] in Ji'an 吉安, Jiangxi
